description.@en: I’ve seen far-flung places, shaken hands with strange people and always know my way along the path.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: When you fail a Folklore or Navigation Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result, but must accept the outcome.
